name: Caught On Tape
description:
This game was made for the Brackey, 2020.2 gamejam in a week! This was once again a one man dev team project which I really enjoyed taking on.

This game has you taking control of Jay, as they explore a haunted tape they've been trapped inside. Can you escape the mansion?

Special thanks to all my play testers:

Poky <3 
The lizard witch 
Blair The bean (also thanks for designing and drawing up the cover)
Marxy 37
And my mom!

And of course, special thanks to you lovely people~
